data.name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Taishi - 「今井宗久」武将データ/ "Sokyu Imai" Officer Data
data.detailed_description:
Collaboration content with the stage performance "Nobunaga's Ambition: Taishi - Haru no Jin ~ Tenkafubu ~ Kondei no Kubi" and "Nobunaga's Ambition: Taishi."

Officer data that allows Hikomaro's character Sokyu Imai, one of the three masters of the tea ceremony, to appear in the game.

▼How to use
Under "Edit Created Officers," set Sokyu Imai to "Active" under "Active/Standby" to allow him to appear in the game.
data.about_the_game:
Collaboration content with the stage performance "Nobunaga's Ambition: Taishi - Haru no Jin ~ Tenkafubu ~ Kondei no Kubi" and "Nobunaga's Ambition: Taishi."

Officer data that allows Hikomaro's character Sokyu Imai, one of the three masters of the tea ceremony, to appear in the game.

▼How to use
Under "Edit Created Officers," set Sokyu Imai to "Active" under "Active/Standby" to allow him to appear in the game.

fullgame.name: NOBUNAGA'S AMBITION: Taishi / 信長の野望･大志

data.supported_languages:
Japanese*, Traditional Chinese, English*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 7 Japanese Version 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 1.8GHz or over
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 x 768 over or 1280 x 720 over display
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 7 Japanese Version 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.0GHz or over
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 x 768 over or 1280 x 720 over display
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
